sentences.en: And even the most impressive sequences have an empty, virtuosity.
sentences.cn: 即便最骇人的连续镜头也透出空洞做作的技巧性.

sentences.en: As chemists began to pry out my secret they discovered my virtuosity.
sentences.cn: 化学家开始探讨我的秘密,他们发现了我的精湛技巧.

sentences.en: At that time, his virtuosity on the trumpet had no parallel in jazz.
sentences.cn: 那时，他高超的小号吹奏技巧在爵士乐界无人能比。

sentences.en: At that time, his virtuosity on the violin had no parallel in classical music.
sentences.cn: 当时在古典音乐他小提琴的技艺是无与伦比的.

sentences.en: But he soon realized that the world of guitar virtuosity was not for him.
sentences.cn: 但是他很快就认识到,吉他演艺对他并不适合.

sentences.en: But Lenovo owes its success more to retailing acumen than technological virtuosity.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,中科院仍持有联想部分股权.

sentences.en: H. Auden , who remarked in his introduction on the young poet's technical virtuosity.
sentences.cn: 奥登, 后者在介绍中提到了这位年轻诗人精湛的技巧.

sentences.en: His virtuosity on a $ 5 , 000 banjo won consistent applause.
sentences.cn: 他弹奏一只价值五千美元的班卓琴的技艺受到了异口同声的称赞.

sentences.en: The art of independent virtuosity took on new importance in his hands.
sentences.cn: 在他那儿,双手的独立性展现了新的重要性.

sentences.en: The violinist's virtuosity has amazed audiences all over the world .
sentences.cn: 小提琴家的精湛技艺使全世界的观众惊诧不已。

sentences.en: The violinist's virtuosity has amazed audiences all over the world.
sentences.cn: 小提琴家的精湛技艺使全世界的观众惊诧不已.

sentences.en: To play the piano. With virtuosity.

words.tran_cn: 行家里手的；艺术爱好者的
艺术品鉴赏家；古董收藏家；艺术大师

trans.tran_cn: （在美术、音乐等方面的）精湛技艺，对艺术品（或古董等）的爱好，（总称）艺术爱好者，古董收藏家
trans.tran_en: a very high degree of skill in performing
